name: Econator
description:
Econator is a game where you clean the streets of Novska, by exploding the trash and throwing the trash bags into the golden trash bin. This game was made in a 2 day period during Unity education at PISMO Novska. It’s a part of our course on Unity! The theme was the city of Novska.

Level Design: Vjekoslav Špoljarić

3D Modeling: Ilija Krišto

Programing: Josip Barun

Programing: Robert Rožić
